title: Persona 3 the Movie 3: Falling Down
synopsis: As the fall season nears its end, Chidori Yoshino, a member of Strega, abducts Junpei Iori. Meanwhile, Makoto Yuuki and the Specialized Extracurricular Execution Squad (SEES) annihilate the Arcana Hanged Man. Soon after, a mysterious playboy named Ryouji Mochizuki transfers into Gekkoukan High School's Class 2-F.
related_anime: ["Persona 3 the Movie 2: Midsummer Knight's Dream", 'Persona 3 the Movie 4: Winter of Rebirth']
